channel.title: Need css style idea for my website
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need a css style idea for my sites Heres my main homepage (yup, i know, it sucks): http://doognotna.co.nz Does anyone know of a theme that would look any good on that?
And heres my webhosting site that ill also apply that css style to: http://webhost.doognotna.co.nz
I will be extremely grateful to anyone who has any good ideas (that would work with my not so 1337 coding skills)
Thanks

item.title: Need css style idea for my website

item.description:
@moerin wrote:

Keep that theme, i really like it

item.title: Need css style idea for my website
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

[quote=“Kollidierende, post:3, topic:184002”][quote author=moerin link=topic=245667.msg2072347#msg2072347 date=1203784793]
This calling Advertising.

But search at http://www.smfforfree.com/support and go to codes and search for it.
[/quote]
He’s not advertising… He’s just showing you his site so you know what you have to work with.[/quote]
I changed my message…

Read full topic
